attributes.action: not change the MOT Test intervals, in the interest of road safety.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our road safety record is one of the best in europe helped by the annual MOT inspection. 30% of vehicles fail the test every year, altering the Test interval to two years will allow defective vehicles to carry on using our roads with possible injury or loss of life. We should be doing our utmost to bring the rest of Europe into line with our test intervals to ensure safer vehicles on all European roads.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=road+safety
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
